Package com.axelor.studio.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChartRecorderService
    This class generate charts using ViewEditor and chart related fields.
    DashboardRecorderService
    This service class used to generate dashboard from ViewEditor of type Dashboard.
    FilterService
    This service class use to generate groovy expression from chart filters.
    FormRecorderService
    This class generate form view from ViewEditor of type 'form'.
    GridRecorderService
    This service class generate GridView from ViewEditor.
    MenuRecorderService
    This service class generate menu from MenuEditor.
    ModelImporterService
    Service class import Models from excel file (xlsx).
    ModelRecorderService
    Service class generate domain xml files from MetaModels.
    ModuleRecorderService
    Abstract service class to handle common method for view and model recording.
    Namming  
    ReportBuilderService
    Service class generate html template from selected metaView for ReportBuilder.
    ReportPrinterService
    Service class create html report for a record using html template.
    RightManagementService
    This service class create Permissions and MetaPermissions from RightManagement objects.
    UpdateAppService
    Service class use to build application and restart tomcat server.
    ViewCalculationService
    Service class use to process ViewCalculation records to convert it to groovy expressions.
    ViewLoaderService
    This service use to find default ViewEditor of type grid and form for a model or create new if not found.
    ViewRecorderService
    This service class handle all view side processing.
